title: MCreator
author: xiaoyi20031010
txt_content:
Executing gradle command: clean build
MCreator was not able to connect to the internet. Gradle tasks might not work.
Microsoft Windows [版本 6.1.7601]
版权所有 (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation。保留所有权利。
F:\第七空间180服客户端\MCreator模组制作器\MCreator170>cd forge
F:\第七空间180服客户端\MCreator模组制作器\MCreator170\forge>SET "JAVA_HOME=F:\第七空间180服客户端\MCreator模组制作器\MCreator170\jdk64\"
F:\第七空间180服客户端\MCreator模组制作器\MCreator170\forge>SET JAVA_EXE=%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java.exe
F:\第七空间180服客户端\MCreator模组制作器\MCreator170\forge>SET PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin\;%PATH%
F:\第七空间180服客户端\MCreator模组制作器\MCreator170\forge>gradlew -Dorg.gradle.jvmargs="-Xms625m -Xmx2693m" clean build
To honour the JVM settings for this build a new JVM will be forked. Please consider using the daemon: https://docs.gradle.org/2.7/userguide/gradle_daemon.html.
做的时候出现这种问题，而且没法制作，

replies.author: 1390mceg
replies.txt_content: 应该是中文路径的问题

replies.author: xiaoyi20031010
replies.txt_content: 没有用，换了全英文也没用

replies.author: xiaoyi20031010
replies.txt_content: 噢，又出现问题了，他做了一个又做不了了
